languages.text: "{name}". {n}Хейнрикс неловко откланивается — все его внимание приковано к вам, словно он силится убедиться, что перед ним — действительно вы, а не коварный двойник. На бледном осунувшемся лице дознавателя залегли темные тени — он явно давно не спал.{/n} "Я потрачу буквально минуту твоего времени. Просто... скажи мне, что с тобой произошло?"

traits.locale_text: "{name}". {n}Хейнрикс неловко откланивается — все его внимание приковано к вашему лицу, словно он силится убедиться, что перед ним — действительно вы, а не коварный двойник. На бледном осунувшемся лице дознавателя залегли темные тени — он явно давно не спал.{/n} "Я потрачу буквально минуту твоего времени. Просто... скажи мне, что с тобой произошло?"

languages.text: "{name}," {n}Heinrix says, with a distracted nod, his eyes glued to you as though trying to ascertain that it really is you, and not some devious lookalike. His face is pale and drawn, with dark shadows under his eyes — he has not been sleeping.{/n} "I will only take up a minute of your time. Just... I need to know — what happened to you?"
languages.original_text: "{name}". {n}Хейнрикс неловко откланивается — все его внимание приковано к вам, словно он силится убедиться, что перед ним — действительно вы, а не коварный двойник. На бледном осунувшемся лице дознавателя залегли темные тени — он явно давно не спал.{/n} "Я потрачу буквально минуту твоего времени. Просто... скажи мне, что с тобой произошло?"

His face is pale and drawn, with dark shadows under his eyes — he has not been sleeping.{/n} "I will only take up a minute of your time. Just... I need to know — what happened to you?"

His face is pale and drawn, with dark shadows under his eyes — he has not been sleeping.{/n} "I will only take up a minute of your time. Just... I need to know — what happened to you?"

His face is pale and drawn, with dark shadows under his eyes — he has not been sleeping.{/n} "I will only take up a minute of your time. Just... I need to know — what happened to you?"

"{name}," {n}Heinrix says, with a distracted nod, his eyes glued to you as though trying to ascertain that it really is you, and not some devious lookalike. His face is pale and drawn, with dark shadows under his eyes — he has not been sleeping.{/n} "I will only take up a minute of your time. Just... I need to know — what happened to you?"

languages.text: “{name}。”{n}海因里希心不在焉地点了点头，目光紧紧盯着你，似乎想确认眼前的人真的是你，而不是什么恶魔假扮的东西。他脸色苍白，眼袋很重，看起来自你离开之后就没再睡过觉了。{/n}“我只占用你一分钟的时间，我……我只想问问，你究竟遇到了什么事情？”
languages.original_text: "{name}," {n}Heinrix says, with a distracted nod, his eyes glued to you as though trying to ascertain that it really is you, and not some devious lookalike. His face is pale and drawn, with dark shadows under his eyes — he has not been sleeping.{/n} "I will only take up a minute of your time. Just... I need to know — what happened to you?"

traits.locale_text: “{name}。”{n}海因里希心不在焉地点了点头，目光紧紧盯着你，似乎想确认眼前的人真的是你，而不是什么恶魔假扮的东西。他脸色苍白，眼袋很重，看起来自你离开之后就没再睡过觉了。{/n}“我只占用你一分钟的时间，我……我只想问问，你究竟遇到了什么事情？”

languages.text: «{name}». {n}Heinrix te llama con un distraído asentimiento. No aparta la vista de ti, como si intentara comprobar que de verdad eres tú y no una imitación astuta. Tiene el rostro pálido y enjuto y ojeras muy profundas. Lleva mucho sin dormir.{/n} «Solo quiero pedirle un momento de su tiempo. Necesito... necesito saberlo. ¿Qué le ha pasado?».
languages.original_text: "{name}," {n}Heinrix says, with a distracted nod, his eyes glued to you as though trying to ascertain that it really is you, and not some devious lookalike. His face is pale and drawn, with dark shadows under his eyes — he has not been sleeping.{/n} "I will only take up a minute of your time. Just... I need to know — what happened to you?"

traits.locale_text: «{name}». {n}Heinrix te llama con un distraído asentimiento. No aparta la vista de ti, como si intentara comprobar que de verdad eres tú y no una imitación astuta. Tiene el rostro pálido y enjuto y ojeras muy profundas. Lleva mucho sin dormir.{/n} «Solo quiero pedirle un momento de su tiempo. Necesito... necesito saberlo. ¿Qué le ha pasado?».

languages.text: 「{name}」{n}と、ハインリックスが上の空のようにうなずきながら言った。彼の目は、それが本当にあなたなのか、それとも何かを企む偽物なのかと確かめるかのようにあなたを見つめていた。その顔は青白く、目の下には黒い隈があった…彼は寝ていないのだ。{/n}「時間は取らせない。ただ…知りたいんだ…何があったんだ？」
languages.original_text: "{name}," {n}Heinrix says, with a distracted nod, his eyes glued to you as though trying to ascertain that it really is you, and not some devious lookalike. His face is pale and drawn, with dark shadows under his eyes — he has not been sleeping.{/n} "I will only take up a minute of your time. Just... I need to know — what happened to you?"

traits.locale_text: 「{name}」{n}と、ハインリックスが上の空のようにうなずきながら言った。彼の目は、それが本当にあなたなのか、それとも何かを企む偽物なのかと確かめるかのようにあなたを見つめていた。その顔は青白く、目の下には黒い隈があった…彼は寝ていないのだ。{/n}「時間は取らせない。ただ…知りたいんだ…何があったんだ？」

languages.text: « {name}, » {n}dit Heinrix avec un hochement de tête distrait, en vous dévisageant comme pour s'assurer que vous êtes bien vous-même et non une créature sournoise qui tenterait de se faire passer pour vous. Ses traits tirés, son teint pâle et les cernes qui lui encerclent les yeux laissent à penser qu'il n'a pas dormi depuis un certain temps.{/n} « Ce ne sera pas long. Je voulais seulement... Je dois savoir : que vous est-il arrivé ? »
languages.original_text: "{name}," {n}Heinrix says, with a distracted nod, his eyes glued to you as though trying to ascertain that it really is you, and not some devious lookalike. His face is pale and drawn, with dark shadows under his eyes — he has not been sleeping.{/n} "I will only take up a minute of your time. Just... I need to know — what happened to you?"

traits.locale_text: « {name}, » {n}dit Heinrix avec un hochement de tête distrait, en vous dévisageant comme pour s'assurer que vous êtes bien vous-même et non une créature sournoise qui tenterait de se faire passer pour vous. Ses traits tirés, son teint pâle et les cernes qui lui encerclent les yeux laissent à penser qu'il n'a pas dormi depuis un certain temps.{/n} « Ce ne sera pas long. Je voulais seulement... Je dois savoir : que vous est-il arrivé ? »

languages.text: "{name}", {n}sagt Heinrix und nickt abwesend. Dabei hat er dich fest im Blick, als wolle er sich vergewissern, dass du es wirklich bist und keine trügerische Doppelgängerin. Sein Gesicht ist blass und zeigt dunkle Augenringe – er hat nicht geschlafen.{/n} "Ich brauche nur eine Minute Eurer Zeit. Ich ... Ich muss es einfach wissen – was ist mit Euch geschehen?"
languages.original_text: "{name}," {n}Heinrix says, with a distracted nod, his eyes glued to you as though trying to ascertain that it really is you, and not some devious lookalike. His face is pale and drawn, with dark shadows under his eyes — he has not been sleeping.{/n} "I will only take up a minute of your time. Just... I need to know — what happened to you?"

traits.locale_text: "{name}", {n}sagt Heinrix und nickt abwesend. Dabei hat er dich fest im Blick, als wolle er sich vergewissern, dass du es wirklich bist und keine trügerische Doppelgängerin. Sein Gesicht ist blass und zeigt dunkle Augenringe – er hat nicht geschlafen.{/n} "Ich brauche nur eine Minute Eurer Zeit. Ich ... Ich muss es einfach wissen – was ist mit Euch geschehen?"

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Heinrix, dikkati dağınık bir şekilde başını sallayarak konuşuyor. Bakışları, karşısında duranın hilekâr bir kopya değil de gerçekten sen olduğundan emin olmaya çalışıyormuşçasına sana kilitlenmiş hâlde. Yüzü solgun ve bitkin duruyor. Gözlerinin altını karanlık gölgeler bürümüş, uyuyamadığı aşikâr.{/n} "Yalnızca bir dakikanı alacağım. Sadece... Bilmem gerek. Başına ne geldi?"
languages.original_text: "{name}," {n}Heinrix says, with a distracted nod, his eyes glued to you as though trying to ascertain that it really is you, and not some devious lookalike. His face is pale and drawn, with dark shadows under his eyes — he has not been sleeping.{/n} "I will only take up a minute of your time. Just... I need to know — what happened to you?"
